    • getChangesInContextInPublicationContext

      @GetMapping("/{publicationContextId}/vocabulary-changes") public ContextChangesDto getChangesInContextInPublicationContext(@PathVariable String publicationContextId, @RequestParam("vocabularyUri") URI vocabularyUri, @RequestParam(required=false) String language)
      Get changes of specified vocabulary in specified publication context with labels in preferred language.
      Parameters:
      publicationContextId - identifier of publication context
      vocabularyUri - URI identifier of vocabulary
      language - preferred language tag
      Returns:
      Object with name of vocabulary a list of changes

    • submitProjectForReview

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping public URI submitProjectForReview(@RequestBody URI projectUri)

    • approvePublicationContext

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PostMapping("/{publicationContextId}/approved") public void approvePublicationContext(@PathVariable String publicationContextId, @RequestBody String finalComment)

    • rejectPublicationContext

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PostMapping("/{publicationContextId}/rejected") public void rejectPublicationContext(@PathVariable String publicationContextId, @RequestBody String finalComment)
